title: Reuters reveals White House rules out ban on natural gas exports this winter
dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
description:
Reuters was first to report the White House has ruled out any ban or curbs on natural-gas exports this winter, […]

The post Reuters reveals White House rules out ban on natural gas exports this winter appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters was first to report the White House has ruled out any ban or curbs on natural-gas exports this winter, in a bid to help alleviate energy shortages in Europe. In March, U.S. President Joe Biden committed to delivering 15 billion cubic metres more of liquefied natural gas to Europe following Russiaâ€™s invasion of Ukraine; the U.S. has already surpassed that goal.

The post Reuters reveals White House rules out ban on natural gas exports this winter appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
